articles.description: "I knew nothing was gonna be the same after hearing this,” said a fan who has Rex Orange County lyrics tattooed on her arm.
articles.content: The musician, whose real name is Alexander O'Connor, pleaded not guilty in a UK court on Monday to six charges of sexually assaulting a woman over two days in June. The provisional trial date is Jan.… [+934 chars]
